comment.author: 63856424@N03
comment._content: Es ist ein fantastig bläck und weit photo

comment.author: 66961359@N03
comment._content: Very unusual angle used on this shot which makes for an interesting photo.The element of movement has been captured beautifully. Such a shame this vibrant "hub" of the town could not have been saved in the mould of say 'Beamish', as a current day tourist attraction. My mother worked in The Empire Theatre and loved the old place.
